thread.title: Fake banking sites wrongly issued with authentication certificates
thread.title_full: Fake banking sites wrongly issued with authentication certificates

author: Rhiannon Williams
title: Fake banking sites wrongly issued with authentication certificates
text: Internet Security Fake banking sites wrongly issued with authentication certificates Fraudster-created sites, impersonating Apple's iTunes, Halifax and Natwest, have been falsely issued security certificates to dupe users into handing over their details A phishing site imitating Natwest's website displaying an SSL certificate, indicated by the padlock icon Photo: netcraft.com
